product_name: Manduka Go Light Yoga Mat Bag
long_description: Sleekly designed for the yogi looking for a classic single-compartment carrying solution, the revamped Go Light travel bag protects your mat and adds convenience to your commute without extra weight.
short_description: Sleekly designed for the yogi looking for a classic single-compartment carrying solution, the revamped Go Light travel bag protects your mat and adds convenience to your commute without extra weight.
